name: RustDesk (OSS)
description: RustDesk is an open-source remote desktop software that allows users to access and control computers from anywhere. It is designed to provide secure, fast, and easy-to-use remote desktop solutions. RustDesk supports features like file transfer, screen sharing, and remote session management, and it works cross-platform on Windows, macOS, and Linux. Its peer-to-peer architecture ensures direct, efficient connections, and it provides end-to-end encryption for secure communication.
